name: Bomb Blob
description:
Bomb Blob is a puzzle platformer made for the Game Makers Tool Kit Game Jam. Bombs serve multiple purposes, you can use bombs to propel yourself, to move  or destroy objects, stun enemies, and a couple of other secret uses. Enemies also generate electricity that can be Diverted to doors to get through, however, touching electricity will kill you. 

Made using Unity.

Everything by Alex Driml.

https://twitter.com/Busalonium
